summary: A player home located in Eastmarch (volcanic tundra) near Eldergleam Sanctuary. No DLCs required
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f1c232][size=5]- Description -[/size][/color]

[size=3]A player home in the volcanic tundra (eastmarch hold) near Eldergleam Sanctuary.
It's a small shack that canÂ be purchased for 2500 septims.

Everything (except glass for windows and scripts) was taken from Skyrim resources.[/size]

[color=#ff7700][size=3][u]NO DLCs REQUIRED

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/4128?]Skyrim Special Edition version[/url][/u][/size][/color]


[youtube]EBPcY9wxqCY[/youtube]
[size=3]Video made by: Pixelgamer[/size]

[color=#f1c232][size=5]- Features -[/size][/color]

[size=3][color=#f1c232]->[/color] Navmeshed inside and out
[color=#f1c232]->[/color] Custom storage and furniture
[color=#f1c232]->[/color] Openable shutters that let the daylight in and it's visible (if you leave them open) from the outside
[color=#f1c232]->[/color] All vanilla crafting
[color=#f1c232]->[/color] Pullout chair option
[color=#f1c232]->[/color] Mr. Salty[/size]


[size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1]- My Other Mods -[/url][/size]

[size=3]And a highly recommended mod[/size]
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53068/?]Rigmor of Bruma[/url][/size]
[size=3]An EPIC 18 mission Quest/Companion mod[/size][/font][/center]
author: 1xmiha
